definitions.definition: (of a person who has the necessary authority) to decide against or refuse to accept a previous decision, an order, a person, etc.:
examples: Every time I make a suggestion at work, my boss overrides me/it.

definitions.definition: to operate an automatic machine by hand:
examples: He overrode the autopilot when he realized it was malfunctioning.

definitions.definition: a device that changes the control of a machine or system in special situations, especially from automatic to manual:
examples: The heating system has a manual override.
